verbose_text: The NMDA antagonist MK-801 increases both dopamine and glutamate efflux primarily in the forebrain regions [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and induces the gene expres-sion of c-Fos through MK-801-evoked glutamatergic neurotransmission and subsequent MAP kinase / AP-1 activation [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NMDA antagonist MK-801 increases both dopamine
